Helping students build contemporary careers in music for over 30 years.

Develop Your Talent.

Our unique curriculum is designed to prepare students through a combined emphasis on artistry, technology and entrepreneurship — the necessary foundation to make a life in music. Learn more »

Discover Your Career.

We believe in supporting our students in every way possible. That’s why we provide robust services that go well beyond the classroom — even beyond graduation. Learn more »
